posts.title: 2019-01-09.vue-vs-angular
posts.text: 1.类型分离，angular 开发更关注的是 html css js 的拆分多文件组件,vue 更推崇单文件组件 2.语法上区别 :2.1 绑定属性与绑定事件 vue :属性 angular [属性],vue @事件 angular (事件)2.2 双向绑定:vue v-model=“属性” ,angular [ngModel]=[属性][(dom属性)] = “属性”2.3 结构语句：v-if ngIf;v-for ngfor ngfor 不支持 in key => track-ny;v-show angular [class.hide];anular 不允许 ngfor 与 ng if 在一个节点上2.4 生命周期：created => init ; mounted => contentinit,viewinit;destory = ;ngchange 约= update;2.5 子组件区分：angular 一种投影插件 一种子组件；2.6 属性：angular 一个 get set 解决，vue 计算属性 监听属性2.7 动态类: :class = “{类名:属性}” :class=”[类名 1,类名 2]” angular [class]=”{类名:属性}”2.8 动态模版：angular ng-templete ng-content => vue templete2.9 插槽：slot -> ng-content

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
